DOC.brief_summary: This study examine efficacy Internet-delivered intervention reduce symptom insomnia breast cancer survivor . Breast cancer patient insomnia ( N=30 ) assign either gain access 6-week treatment program immediately ( experimental group ) follow study participation ( control group ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Internet-based Intervention Insomnia Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Female Diagnosed breast cancer Age 18 older Completed primary treatment least one month prior enrollment Diagnosis insomnia Exclusion criterion : Experiencing sleep disorder insomnia ( e.g. , sleep apnea ) Experiencing major depressive episode serious psychiatric disturbance Modification psychotropic medication within previous month Undergoing current psychotherapy treatment
